topic.title: Manage user on ZeroWiki?
topic.body:
Hi all,

I wonder if there's a way to manage right on a ZeroWiki?

For example, if I want to have it read only and be the only one with write access?
Or if I want to give write right only to some user (or even read access to only a selected group of user)?

I tried to search a bit on the net but I didn't find something useful, so if someone has tips for managing ZeroWiki, I'm listening.
